pr_title: Add additional permission checks in AuditMessageIT

timeline.message: add security check for flush operation

timeline.bodyText: Normally, a range would be specified so that the start sorts before the end, but 's' sorts after 'e'. You should change it to match myRow and myRow~ like the previous line, instead, so that way this will still work, even if we later add additional argument checks to make sure the start sorts before the end.
timeline.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: Funny thing is, that is actually what I had originally but I changed it to mimic the parameters names for whatever reason.
replies.author: Manno15

timeline.message: add test to make sure we can flush
add basic test for System.SYSTEM perm
revise flush test and add set/remove prop test

Update ManagerApiIT

* Make tests independent with consistent naming scheme
* Make use of assertThrows to simplify checks
* Rename variables and inline the test operations to make it easier to
  follow the test intentions
